content: Hello! Upload CV or ask a query.

Extracted CV summary: Darshan Kumar Senior Software Engineer Email : darshan@cyberxdefend.com Phone : +32 472 31 58 51  Professional Summary Dynamic and results-oriented professional with over 10+ years of experience in Software Development, Cloud Infrastructure, Big Data, AI, and Generative AI. Proven track record of driving innovation, efficiency, and delivering impactful technology solutions across multiple industries, including blockchain, e-commerce, health tech, and small industries. Skilled in building MVPs for startups, with a strong analytical mindset and a deep commitment to continuous learning and open-source contributions. Passionate about advancing technologies and sustainable practices, particularly within Big Data, AI, and other industries domain. Key Expertise • Cloud and DevOps Proficiency: Extensive experience in AWS Cloud Architecture and multi-cloud environments (AWS, Azure, DigitalOcean). Skilled in managing infrastructure with services like Lambda, ECS (Fargate), ECR, S3, ALB/NLB, CloudFront, CloudWatch, and EC2, along with Docker containerization for distributed applications. Proficient in Azure services, including Azure Functions, Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Azure Blob Storage, Azure Application Gateway, Azure CDN, Azure Monitor, Azure Virtual Machines, and Azure Service Bus for building, deploying, and managing scalable cloud solutions. • AI and Generative AI Development: Proficient in developing AI and Generative AI solutions using Python libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, and OpenAI API, OLLAMA LLM integration. Skilled in implementing machine learning and NLP models for data-driven insights and innovative AI solutions. • Microservices & Distributed Systems: Expertise in designing and deploying applications based on microservices architecture, ensuring scalability and resilience across distributed systems. • Full Stack & API Development: Strong backend development skills in Node.js and Python, with experience in frameworks like FastAPI, Flask, and Django for building robust APIs and web applications. Proficient in API integrations, payment gateways, and cryptocurrency wallets. Frontend expertise in responsive, cross-browser UIs using JavaScript frameworks like AngularJS with CSS, SCSS, and Bootstrap, Tailwind. • Big Data and Data Engineering: Deep experience in Big Data technologies, including configuring and managing Hadoop clusters, as well as hands-on work with Apache Kafka, Spark, Atlas, and Falcon for data processing and governance. • Agile Project Management & Automation: Experienced in Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban), with strong skills in CI/CD pipeline creation and DevOps automation. Skilled in developing tools to streamline workflows and reduce manual developer tasks using Bitbucket, GitLab, and GitHub. Education Master in Computer Application AMCEC College, Bangalore, India (07/2011 - 11/2013) Bachelor in Computer Application Surana College, Bangalore, India (06/2008 - 05/2011) Achievements Apache Big Data committer since 2015, contributing to key projects like Atlas, Falcon, and Kona, and actively engaging in industry conferences such as ReactEurope and ApacheCon. Additionally, mentor and advisor to global startups (e.g., Gify Studio, BlueRabbit), supporting MVP development and leading automation initiatives with international teams. Professional Experience Company: Sciensano-Healthdata, Belgium  Position: Technical Lead - Full Stack & DevOps  (July 2020 – Dec 2024) Led the technical development and DevOps for HealthData Belgium’s national health data platform, supporting comprehensive data collection and reporting for a wide range of diseases, including rare diseases. Responsible for architecting and maintaining a scalable infrastructure to collect and manage health data across hospitals nationwide. • Architected and implemented data pipelines using Java, Python, and SQL, enabling standardized data collection across multiple diseases with SNOMED CT integration for data accuracy. Developed dynamic, responsive frontends with Angular and streamlined backend processes in Node.js to support seamless data capture and processing. • Led a cross-functional team in designing a resilient architecture, implementing data science and analytics models to support predictive insights on health trends. Oversaw hospital-wide deployments and maintained robust DevOps practices for continuous integration, high availability, and system reliability across the healthcare network. • Developed robust Python-based microservices and APIs using FastAPI and Flask to process health data securely and efficiently, integrating with third-party healthcare systems and ensuring compliance with GDPR and other regulatory standards. Designed backend modules to automate data validation and aggregation, significantly reducing manual effort and increasing system throughput.  Company: Unova, Belgium Position: DevOps and Blockchain Developer (Jan 2020 – Sept 2022) Blockchain-based Supply Chain Traceability Developed a private blockchain solution for B2B supply chain clients, enabling precise, end-to-end product traceability. This ecosystem provides consumers with transparent, verifiable insights into the product's origin and production journey.  • Implemented Ethereum-based smart contracts to securely record and validate each step in the supply chain, ensuring tamper-proof product data.
